      • waitForArduinoToBoot

        public boolean waitForArduinoToBoot(int wait,
                                    java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Will wait for the arduino to received the "ready" paket or the arduino to respond to our messages sent.
        Parameters:
        wait - the maximum time to wait
        timeUnit - the units to wait
        Returns:
        true if the arduino did response within the given time otherwise false

      • waitForArduinoToBoot

        public boolean waitForArduinoToBoot(int wait,
                                    java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit,
                                    ConnectionBasedLink.Mode mode)
        Will wait for the arduino to received the "ready" paket or the arduino to respond to our messages sent.
        Parameters:
        wait - the maximum time to wait
        timeUnit - the units to wait
        mode - the messages to be interpreted as "ok"
        Returns:
        true if the arduino did response within the given time otherwise false
